content: it’s a pain the first year, but it may make sense to set you up as an s-corp? I’m sure you’ve researched it, and I think I remember you mentioning it in a previous post, but as a person who just signed taxes last night, it’s on my mind. we paid significantly lower taxes vs paying self-employment taxes [that extra 12.5% is a doozy] but it depends on how much you make vs how much it costs to start to make it worthwhile obvi. everything ever is so expensive.
